ship_types.name: Colony Ship - Stacked Fusion
ship_types.description: Large cylindrical colony ship with stacked decks around a central fusion reactor core. Designed for long-duration missions with thousands of colonists in cryosleep.

ship_types.name: Colony Ship - Rotating Ring
ship_types.description: Massive rotating ring structure providing artificial gravity through centrifugal force. Central hub contains engineering and docking facilities.

ship_types.name: Colony Ship - Solar Sail
ship_types.description: Lightweight colony ship propelled by enormous solar sails. Minimalist design prioritizes efficiency over comfort.

ship_types.name: Military Destroyer
ship_types.description: Combat-oriented vessel with modular weapon systems and heavy armor plating. Industrial aesthetic with exposed structural elements.

ship_types.name: Science Research Vessel
ship_types.description: Specialized research ship with extensive laboratory facilities and sensor arrays. Clean, high-tech interior optimized for scientific work.
